Class Borrowing

java.lang.Object
com.library.library_management.entities.Borrowing
@Entity public class Borrowing extends Object
Entity class representing a borrowing record in the library management system.

The Borrowing entity logs the borrowing of a specific Copy by a Person, along with the borrowing and optional return dates. It is mapped to the BORROWING table in the database using JPA annotations.

This class defines relationships with the Person and Copy entities, ensuring that each borrowing event is associated with a borrower and a specific copy of a book.

  • Constructor Details

    • Borrowing

      public Borrowing()
      Default no-argument constructor for JPA.

    • Borrowing

      public Borrowing(Person user, Copy copy, LocalDate borrowDate, LocalDate returnDate)
      Constructs a new Borrowing instance with the specified user, copy, borrowing date, and return date.
      Parameters:
      user - the Person who borrowed the copy
      copy - the Copy of the book that was borrowed
      borrowDate - the date the borrowing occurred
      returnDate - the date the copy was returned (optional, can be null)
